輲字的基本解释

輲
chuán
〔輲车〕古代运载棺材的车子。

輲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chuán］
［《廣韻》市緣切，平仙，禪。］
(1)指古代四轮车的后面低小的两个轮子。
(2)没有辐条，以圆木作车轮的车子。参见“輲車”。
(3)通“遄”。速。

輲字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　輲； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1246第12
【廣韻】市緣切【集韻】淳沿切【等韻】時緣切，?音遄。【廣韻】無輻車。【玉篇】同輇。　又【集韻】豎兗切，音歂。載柩車也。【禮·雜記】載以輲車。【註】有輻者別用木爲之，無輻者合大木爲之。

輲字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
輲字的起名意思

暂无。

輲
Basic explanation of words
輲
chuán
[輲车] The ancient car used to carry the coffin.
輲
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chuán]
["Guangyun" City Yuanqi, Pingxian, Zen. ]
(1) Refers to the two low wheels at the back of the ancient four-wheeled vehicle.
(2) A car that has no spokes and uses logs as wheels. See "car".
(3) Through "Tun". speed.
輲
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Car Character Department] 　輲; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1246 No. 12
[Guang Yun] City edge cut [Ji Yun] Chun along the edge cut [Waiting rhyme] Time edge cut, sound trance. [Guangyun] Non-spoke car. [Jade articles] The same thing.　[Jiyun] Vertical cutting, sound saving. Carrying the hearse too. 【Ritual·Miscellaneous Notes】carried in a car. [Note] Do not use wood for those with spokes, and use large wood for those without spokes.
輲
